emojis.name: Japanese Goblin
emojis.meaning: A red face with an elongated nose, representing Japanese folklore creatures known as tengu, symbolizing mischief and supernatural trickery.

emojis.meaning: A cat face with squinted happy eyes and big smile, showing intense feline delight or playful excitement about something.

emojis.name: See-No-Evil Monkey

emojis.name: Speak-No-Evil Monkey
